description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of notes in an Android application. It manages view creation, data binding, and user interactions such as editing and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter that displays notes with options to edit or delete each item.

methods.name: NoteAdapter
methods.description: Constructor initializing the adapter with a list of notes and actions for editing and deleting.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds note data to the ViewHolder and sets click listeners for edit and delete actions.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: Inner class holding references to the views for each note item.
